headline: Mizuho turns bullish on pizza chains, flags burger brands as laggards
summary: Investing.com -- Mizuho set a cautious tone on the restaurant sector as an industry-wide price war squeezes margins, but said pizza quick-service chains and casual dining names are best positioned to outperform.

raw.headline: Mizuho turns bullish on pizza chains, flags burger brands as laggards
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Mizuho set a cautious tone on the restaurant sector as an industry-wide price war squeezes margins, but said pizza quick-service chains and casual dining names are best positioned to outperform.

headline: Domino’s Pizza Enterprises Shares Fall After Denying Bain Talks
summary: The pizza chain’s shares had initially jumped as much as 23% to A$19 in Sydney trading after the Australian Financial Review reported Bain is considering buying the company in a deal worth as much as A$4 billion ($2.6 billion).  After Domino’s shot down the report, saying it “hasn’t received any proposal” or had any communication with Bain, the shares erased most of the gains to trade at A$16.53 at 2:45 p.m. Sydney time.  Billionaire Jack Cowin, the largest shareholder of Domino’s Pizza Enterprises, took charge at the company earlier this year to implement a turnaround.
